verses.verse: Dominion <S%H4910><s%> and <S%H6343>fear<s%> are with <S%H6213>him<s%>; He maketh <S%H7965>peace<s%> in his high <S%H4791>places<s%>.
Is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H1416>armies<s%>? And upon whom doth not his <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>?
How then can <S%H582>man<s%> be <S%H6663>just<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>? Or how can he be <S%H2135>clean<s%> that is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>?
Behold <S%H3394><s%>, even the moon hath no <S%H166>brightness<s%>, And the <S%H3556>stars<s%> are not <S%H2141>pure<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight<s%>:
How much less <S%H582>man<s%>, that is a <S%H7415>worm<s%>! And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that is a <S%H8438>worm<s%>!
